articles.content: UNIVERSITY PARK, Pa. — Countless people neglect sleep during the workweek with the expectation they’ll “make up for it” by sleeping in over the weekend. Fascinating new findings by a team at Penn Sta… [+3864 chars]

articles.title: Alcohol deaths among women rise at a faster rate than men - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: In the last two decades, more and more Americans have died from drinking-related causes. But a new study shows alcohol-related deaths are rising faster among women than men. Laura Barrón-López discussed the research with Dr. Paula Cook, a physician who specia…
articles.content:
Laura Barrón-López:
Amna, deaths from excessive drinking spiked during the pandemic, especially among women.
